metaData.description: This sample demonstrates the cascading parameters support by listing the sub category products, based on product category in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the overview of company sales by year with grouping feature in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the employee details such as employee image, name, address and phone number by using the ASP.NET Core List report item.
This sample demonstrates the complete details of sales orders by using Adventure Works data in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the ASP.NET Core Tablix with Row Grouping by sales region and drill down (expand/collapse) the group details.
This sample demonstrates to view shared dataset and Tablix rows with conditional formatting in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the overview of all the customer support to keep track of service trend in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the overview of theater tickets sold details by shows and date in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the customer behavior and conversion trend for a fictitious e-commerce website in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the patient satisfaction trends during hospital visits in ASP.NET Core platform.
The sample demonstrates the spending/expense patterns of an individual against the budget in ASP.NET Core platform.
This sample demonstrates the sales performance of different products and suppliers in ASP.NET Core platform.
metaData.title: Northwind Product Report

metaData.description: This sample demonstrates the sales order information based on sale order number in ASP.NET Core platform.
This report demonstrates sales invoice details and also illustrates the usage of report viewer parameters, expressions and calculated fields in Tablix report item.
This sample demonstrates the sorting and group total capabilities of ASP.NET Core Report Viewer using Tablix report item.
